title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       2014 Horseshoe Bend National Military Park Compendium (.pdf)  Â    As of February 22, 2010, a new federal law allows people who can legally possess firearms under applicable federal, state, and local laws to carry firearms in this park.  It is the responsibility of visitors to understand and comply with all applicable state, local, and federal firearms laws before entering this park. As a starting point about Alabama firearms laws please go to the following web site and note in particular Section 13A-11-75  and Regulation 2009-SP-1 (Rule No. 220-5-.08).   www.ago.alabama.gov/issue/Alabama_Weapon_Law.pdf   Federal law also prohibits firearms in certain facilities in this park; those places are marked with signs at all public entrances.
